title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  New cmdlet for exporting Activity Explorer logs

description.newValue:
,Export feature of Activity Explorer has limitation of 10,000 rows. Our new feature will allow users to use cmdlet and export all the rows for all the data up to 30 days.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/data-classification-activity-explorer?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: October CY2022
Preview date: August CY2022
